analysis.description:
GameRewardToken.finalizeCrowdfunding (/unique_chucks/41/0xda4ecdd0792a71be43d52b4972bf99181abad4ae.sol#541-562) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- devsHolder.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/41/0xda4ecdd0792a71be43d52b4972bf99181abad4ae.sol#561-562)
